title: sharaNu sharaNu shrI
sahitya:
sharaNu sharaNu shrI vAyu dEvage sharaNu anjana tanayage sharaNu draupadi ramaNa bhImage sharaNu shri madhva rAyage


caraNam 1    sItekAgi sharadi langisi shIgra vanadali pOguta kyAdiyindali mugisidi prakyAdi guru hanumantA 
    caraNam 2    kaurava balu bhangadindali ati sauri endenisi koNDu nI parama utsAhadinda aNNage paTTa kaTTida bhImane
    caraNam 3    madhva shAstrava mADi bOdisi mAyigaLanella Odisi madhvarAya nendenisi mereda purandara viTTalana dAsage
